author: ate
msg: Fixing a small typo which caused incorrect handling of portlet invocation errors during processAction

author: malderson
msg: Fixed DIRSERVER-1343 (Replacing indexed attribute always grows JDBM database) by applying patch from JDBM CVS (revision 1.18).

author: woonsan
msg: Removes fragment parameter in the PortletRendererImpl's internal method invocations and RenderingJobImpl constructor
because the fragment can be retrieved by the portletWindow.
So, I think it is desirable to use portletWindow instead of passing another fragment parameter to prevent later possible problems.
